message:
Fix comment positioning and scroll UX issues

- Switch comment positioning from getBoundingClientRect to offsetTop for scroll-independent coordinates
- Prevent browser auto-scroll on focus to stop position shifts when clicking after scrolling
- Add bottom padding (41px) to account for fixed stats bar, eliminating stuck scroll zones
- Fine-tune comment vertical alignment with 0.7 lineHeight offset adjustment
- Remove auto-focus on writing view to prevent unwanted scrolling
- Add font preloading and font-display: swap to prevent FOIT
- Implement highlight collision detection in EditorEngine
